headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Hard Mode Event: The First Dose
content:
The First Dose Hard Mode Event enters its penultimate week — join up with Dax and the Fooliganz to earn some rare items as they claw their way back into the thick of Southern San Andreas’ psychedelic market.

And now, players who have completed all six missions on Hard difficulty at any point during the First Dose Hard Mode Event will receive a special Pump Shotgun tint.

The First Dose Hard Mode Event runs through February 8, and all the rewards will be delivered before February 17.
